title: Harnessing alcohols as sustainable reagents for late-stage functionalisation: synthesis of drugs and bio-inspired compounds
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS00942D, Review Article
Sourajit Bera, Lalit Mohan Kabadwal, Debasis Banerjee
This review collectively discussed the utilisation of alcohols in various organic transformations and their application toward intermediates of drugs, drug derivatives and natural product-like molecules.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
